author: remm
msg: - Add comments about Sun JDK 1.2 and 1.3 under Linux.

author: remm
msg: - Fix for #4023. Add some code to stop the initialization if the doc base is
invalid. In that case, the web application won't be started (which seems
appropriate), and errors will be logged (one about the path being invalid,
and another about the context not being started).
